data.actual_result: Typing indicator appears and then disappears when it shouldn’t
data.expected_result: Typing indicator doesn’t appear then disappear
data.short_description: Tapping the three dots in account in user settings flashes the typing indicatot
data.steps_to_repro: - Navigate to account under user settings - Wait until the typing indicator flashes off - When the typing indicator disappeara, immediately tap the three dots and observe where the typing indicator was
